attributes.headline: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff expects more than half of employees to work from home after the pandemic: 'The past is gone'
attributes.summary: In an interview on Monday, Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff said that the number of employees working from home will remain high even after the Covid pandemic ends.

attributes.headline: AMC's aggressive post-pandemic strategy could pay off as moviegoers flock back to cinemas
attributes.summary: AMC's plans to pick-up empty theater locations could pay off as moviegoers return in record numbers.

attributes.headline: FDA approves Biogen's Alzheimer's drug, the first new therapy for the disease in nearly two decades
attributes.summary: The drug, which is marketed under the name Aduhelm, is expected to generate billions of dollars in revenue for the company.
